subject: CNN.com Daily Top 10
body:
CNN.com Daily Top 10


































Honda dropping Accord Hybrid
The new Honda Accord, which will go on sale in September, will not be available in a gasoline-electric hybrid version, according to a company spokesman.





2. Comics love leads to graphic novel





3. Plane goes down in Lake Michigan





4. McCarthy talks with Oprah





5. Cyclone heads toward Persian Gulf





6. Mass grave uncovers Nazi victims





7. Are Ramsey, Twitty an item?





8. 4th suspect in JFK plot surrenders





9. Libby sentenced to 30 months





10. Clinton: God helped marital strife




 
















Diploma denied for cheering
A high school student was denied her diploma because of cheers from the crowd. WHOI's Jessica Wheeler reports.





2. Paris Hilton goes to jail

9. Hollywood minute
